<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swipe](/Feats.aspx?ID=142) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 89 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You make a wide, arcing swing. Make a single melee Strike and compare the attack roll result to the ACs of up to two foes, each of whom must be within your melee reach and adjacent to the other. Roll damage only once and apply it to each creature you hit. A Swipe counts as two attacks for your multiple attack penalty. 

If you're using a weapon with the [sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194) trait, its modifier applies to all your Swipe attacks.
name: Swipe
